Literature.Title: Functional characterization, antimicrobial effects, and potential antibacterial mechanisms of new mastoparan peptides from hornet venom (Vespa ducalis, Vespa mandarinia, and Vespa affinis).
Literature.Author: Wen X, Gongpan P,  Meng Y, Nieh JC, Yuan H, Tan K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=256µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=256µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=256µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=256µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CGMCC 1.10712(no activity data),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(no activity data)
